fields.title: first blog
fields.content: My personal blog, it is for sharing with my life and learning process, welcome you guys' visiting, and I am very glad to communicate with different people and experience new things. Also, If you guy think there's a problem or any other parts could be improved, you can contact me immediately, the address is just on the bottom of the page, I have four ways for you to find me,  and I am just a person who likes to accept others' suggestion, thanks for giving me good ideas! ^__^
fields.description: My personal blog...

fields.title: So upset
fields.content:
###Days repeat and repeat again###
 
It seems a deadlock, I do not know how to jump out of it, sometimes I think what I will do in the future, but never come up with an answer. Summer vacation seems a bit longer, spending days and days at home, how to kill this time. Eating, learning, sleeping, again and again, it indeed likes one of the friends ever said, a little scared but endless. Roting the English words with the sunlight at dawn, eating bread as breakfast with milk, this is the coziest thing I experience the day. Staring the screen almost for the whole day makes my eyes dry as a bone, nothing different, nothing unique, does everyone experience this? As one is born, as one goes. Maybe the most exciting thing is the fitness every two days, sweating, holding the apparatus, the ache and tearing muscle are the evidence I am alive.

Silent in appearance, but fresh in the mind, that might be the secret of every melancholiac, poet and also artist. The gap between reality and imagination fears you, that quite like you discover you are with nothing weaken from a dream. What should I do, who is the master of my life? What is the meaning of our lives, studying, working, reproducing, and die. One is born with unequal undoubtedly, 

Silent in appearance, but fire in the heart, that might be the secret of being a person. I always insist on myself and tell me I can do it, but it is endless, so long that I could not see the end, naturally, trapped in panic,  this kind of panic would let you fear everything, unwilling to do anything that you ever fight with.
Gradually, even though the most confident thing that you are adept would be mess up. Lacking confidence is a really bad because I will never step my feet toward the direction that I had yet planned. The lucky thing is I am never a weak man, even though something strikes dramatically, I will stand up again, never say give up, never settle, maybe that is why I differ from others. 

Time flies, something you could not imagine, people are always changing, I have been changed a lot after graduating from senior school, that is the most horrible period I experienced in the whole life. Listening classes, (some teachers in the senior school are real unqualified, especially the head-teacher, math teacher, watching her solving a problem consuming the whole class was one of the funny activities during that dark time, why she could spend the whole class time? She was lack of preparing the class,  I hate the person who said it is old enough to teach you something as a reason not devoting 100% efforts, next time write the detail, a long story), solving the problem sets, going to the after-class tutor center, for the one year, just doing these fucking things. Sleeping is the happiest thing I just want, that likes hemp, like the drug, easing my life. 

Fine, yet writing so much, spending 1 hour, just escaping speaking practice, but feel good, at least better than thinking in the blank. First time experiencing writing dairy is so wonderful, especially in English, for I tried it.
fields.description: A reflect on life.

But a lesson gets, save your writing instantly if is long.

fields.title: my grandparents I
fields.content:
Yesterday, I visited the old house in the countryside, which brought me up when I was a little child before I went to study in the city. Father was preparing the burial ritual(calling some carpenters to make coffin for grandparents), since they have been grown such an age, death is no more remote and unfamiliar with them, preparing is not unrespect to them, at least people in the countryside always think highly of that, maybe people in the city are so poor that most of them have no choice but to cremate after they are dead. Luckily, everyone was not sad and even a pleasure revealed from their eyes. Noticing the location in front of the gate the big elm should be original, even it was removed for a long time 2 or 3 years, that big elm was old enough(bigger than me), when I was a little boy, it had been so tall in my memory. Facing the profile of my grandparents’, I had no words and don’t know what to say at that moment, we looked each other silently, leaving the carpenter cutting the wood, polishing the plank, spraying the saw dust flying in the air. Noisy from the machine spread through the whole house, but everything appeared in my mind clearly during the time when I lived with them including my childhood and the family history. 

In my memory, my grandparents didn’t get a good education, but he loves reading, especially “three kingdoms”, reading them over and over again when he came to my house in the city., and he loves red face “guan yu”, right and brave, as most people, most of the stories I heard when I was young just from his words. Expecting his children succeeding in the learning, but unfortunately, none of his children get the university degree. But it’s not hard to imagine children in the countryside couldn't get a good education and compete with students in the city until now, not to mention that material insufficient age. I admire my grandfather because I used to study at the countryside primary school, he usually hovered at he gate of the school, using his old bicycle with beam to pick me to home, no absence at once and even responsible than my mom when I study in the city. The regular thing also includes buying me unhealthy food(“sanwu”, everyone also should know that, but people in countryside consider them are good things for children since there aren’t anything better to purchase and if any they couldn’t afford, anyway, which equals to express their love for children). Sitting backseat of the bicycle, holding food might be most satisfying things at that time(I recently knew I was sent to the countryside in order to avoid disease when sars burst out in China). The other thing I heard from my aunt was when he was working in the city, once he fell down from the scaffold, at the height of 3 or 4 storey, but he never told anyone without his workmates, reviving at the hospital solely for several months until he could move individually. I ever saw the precious photo which he took at the young age(20 ages), handsome(no kidding) absolutely, but he could never come back again since he lost one of his eyes when celebrating my old brother’s full-month feast and had an operation several years ago. The story of his right eye should draw back to twenty-one years ago, the old as my brother, that day should be happy for him because of the birth of his first grandson, but when he was chopping wood, one sharp wood burst out from the rough stake into his right eye. He lied curly on the ground until someone found him and my father immediately sent him to the hospital. Luckily, it didn’t endanger his life, but one of his eyes was lost forever, for 21 years on this summer vacation when my brother had his birthday. Everyone at home said him stubborn, remarking characters on the screen endlessly even though they are fake, and when he was after operation on his leg at the hospital, doctors said moving his leg slowly could be beneficial for his recovery, but he refused to move just because of distress it brought, and he didn’t get on well with grandma usually, making her nearly cry every time, but the real reason(I guess) is he lost the leader position at home when he couldn’t contribute to this family, all heavy workload shifted on my father’s shoulder. One thing more is he admires Mao, one of his supporters and even said the life would be better if Mao was alive(I could feel the misleading of the Chinese medium vividly, happening around my life).

It’s too long, beyond my expectation, deciding to divide the article into 2 parts.
fields.description: This two days, I went old house where my grandparents lived, having some thoughts about them and days I lived with them when I was young.

fields.title: my grandparents II
fields.content:
Ah, a free time, continuing my writing of my grandparents. But actually, I think everyone in my family is characteristic and they have their unique story, everyone’s experience is so different and realistic, but limited to time(maybe finish in the future, uncertain time) I couldn’t write all of them down. So this time I am going to talk about my grandma, a kind-hearted woman, bringing up 3 kids and upholding family in the small village, she used to support the whole family by plowing the farmland when grandpa worked in the city, caring three kids and coping with unfriendly relatives(people in the countryside always quarrel for this trivial matters, fighting for profits even nominal, but unluckily my grandma was always on the weak side, all in all, all things had been gone with the wind, until now they don’t want to put the past things on the desk), the days 

Deep in mind, my grandma is a kid-loving elder, especially when I and my brother were born. Her leg is not good, feeling distressed vastly in the rainy days(so did my mother’s mother, maybe something relevant to the long-lasting labor in the farmland, an epidemic in the countryside), recent years got worse, beginning holding the walking stick when roaming. Once I viewed one of our(at that time I had not born yet…) family photos, she seemed so young and vigorous, particularly her face, with little wrinkle, but I couldn’t retrieve when her skin on the face collapse, maybe one of reason I get so surprised why she could become old rapidly is she always wearing the artificial tooth, providing the force to uphold the skin, and I seldom notice her face without artificial tooth. She is so sentimental, worrying this and worrying that, even the smallest thing so that my parents do not dare to tell her some bad news, for example, my father’s business get bad or I went another province studying. Another anecdote is one of his brothers got lost when they escaped starvation and finally found him(after 2000 years). 

She is so feudal, believe Buddinism even though they are not true, but you know religious always give people faith, this phenomenon happens more frequently in the countryside, worshiping ghosts and gods can’t be common in the countryside and almost every family has some statues for worshiping. There are two things I could remember clearly about her feudalism, one is during the period when I prepare for my higher education entrance examination, she burned incense every day, according to what she said, the dust of incense could fill up the whole dustbin.(I am sorry to her that I didn’t try my best study when I was in senior school) And the other one was when I was a little boy and I lived with them, once I accompanied with them farming on the field, then a rainbow appeared in the sky(that might be the most beautiful thing I viewed at the first time of life at that time) and I pointed that telling her “Look, grandma, a rainbow”. She suddenly blocked my finger and told me pointing the rainbow would cut off my finger(even now I still don’t know how this stranger feudal ritual come from, maybe another black story tale). She kept burning incense when big days coming(celebrating the new year or the special day of every month’s ), hoping everything goes smoothly and every member is in a good state. 

But this time I went home, it seems that I have not too much to say, actually, the words become fewer begins when I come to the city, receiving education and having a comprehensive of the part of the real world has changed me, I am never a 5 years old boy limited that small place, the words naturally become distinct for her, I can’t recome that day, doing homework on the cement plate in front of the gateway, digging the clay with me small hoe, acting as doctor injecting our persimmon tree with water by used needle tubing which leading it to produce abnormal fruit for many years. Growing gradually, having little to share. Everyone in my family says I am silent as a pole, but Why? People are all growing, some words you said at a young age you might think that is reasonable at that moment, but you will find that is amusing and foolish now, we all can’t say that words just for amuse someone else for the whole life, keeping silent might be the right way. Little words could be a sign of the growth, a bridge that remarks I am old enough to do some normal things which an adult should do. Fine, come back to the right way, I couldn’t figure out what she is thinking when we sitting together, she is fear? sad? or she is the pleasure with descent and the elaborate coffin? I just don’t know, but the peace from her profile could be the answer, that’s enough. Watching her profile should better than saying some words, and this time I feel the death vividly and realistically, for you know someday she will leave you, never come back, this is a cycle, the life cycle of every person. I even could imagine the day when I am going to pass away, what should say to my offsprings. At the time when we are going to leave, she nearly cried again, as usual, I don’t know how many times left for me to see them for I am busier and busier as time goes even going abroad in the future. 

Ok, all of my nonsense has been printed out, some thinking of mine and records of my grandparents’ normal but nonpedestrian life. For my favorite grandparents, even though sometimes I am not good at expressing out of my face, but I indeed love you all the time.
fields.description: Continuing the last article, ⓶ part.

fields.title: a huge disaster
fields.content: Sick today, maybe poision from bean sprout. Voniting and diarrhea didn't stop until all of content in my stomach have been clean out. Anything else didn't want to do for the energy had been used up. Ruin my whole afternoon and evening, leavung me fransfusing with my aunt in the hospital. Dozens os disappointment fron the hospital curing service, doctors are all indifferent and in avarice, feeling poor patients couldn't survive vividly. An unpredecent appreciation to the family members, looking forward to take them to travel around the world as a reward. Plans have to be delied. But an important lesson has been gotten, taking care of you body seriously, especially when you are outside lonely. Being stronger from the phisical surferring!
fields.description: A bad day, the first disease of the whole year.☹️☹️☹️

fields.title: java_JIP1
fields.content:
对象和类(9.5)
===

- 如果一个引用类型(class)的数据域没有任何引用对象，那么这个数据域就会有null.
String name; ————> another class: student.name (null NullPointException错误)

- 对基本类型来说，存储的值是基本类型值。对引用对象来说，存储的是一个引用，是对象的存储地址。

- 垃圾回收：垃圾是指以前引用的对象不再有用。回收是指系统自动回收他所在的空间。

- 类构造：变量区域，结构体，方法。

fields.title: node
fields.content:
This is a strange title, isn’t it, but actually it is an answer for the question which my father asked me on the way to the gym place. Sitting in the his car, he suddenly asked me:” Hi pan, do you think your introverted personality has something to do with my eductional method when I treated you at your young age?.” I perfunctorily said with low voice even he could not hear me, “No”, I responded. In fact, I am abosolutely introverted, it depends on what’s the defination of the “introverted”. If he thinks non-introverted is when people communicate with others and never stop talking, I admit I am introverted. But why should we talk a lot with those nonsense which has no actual meaning, for maintain relationship? If I have no choice but to keep the relationship with others in this way, I even give up this friend. In another aspect, I am not conservational, for one thing, I know the importance of making friends and another one is  talking with different people is pretty interesting, everyone has their story, everyone is unique. Even I don’t own this experience, it can expand my horizon. So the answer is clear, I am not introverted, what I talk and when I make firends are just exposed to him, I am just always like one that have been existed in his heart and never be changed. Maybe that just my real image for this man, something like he really doen’t know me, there is a broad wall isolates ourselves.


I am very superised when he asked me such a question, I even think without hesitation and said to him, clearly, this is a irresponsible answer. But the answer is meaningless since I have been grown up and could not be reversed. I though this question all the time during my fitness in the gym and along the way home. And then, this article is just what I want to say. This man is so tired these day that spend his most time sleeping in the home, I don’t know why he asked this question suddenly. But appearantly, his educational methdology has faults and even unsuccessful, because he never read educational books and adopt ways according to his own experience, in other words, his experience is from his parents(my grandparents), and to be exactly if based on the pedagogy, that is no eudcational methods. What he did most during my childhood is hitting me when I made mistakes, among which most situations are I didn’t get expected grades. The goal of this Chinese traditional method is requesting children being submitted to parents, real Chinese. But one of which hurts me so much is my parents do not fulfill their promise when we made previously(such as I can give you reward if you can get xxx in xxx exam). One thing I remeber clearly is that in my junior school, I got a not bad grade and achieve his expectation and I requested a psp. But he just prefunctory said it was harmful for my study and forgot the promise at all. And I just believed his word “It would affect my grade”, being timid to fight for my reasonable right. Buying it is one thing that he should have do and my grade is just another thing. So I am so desired of games during that young age, but you can’t get it, just because timidness and their default, for six years. Staying in that comfort zone, numbing myself. I also have not a intimiate connection with my mom, I remebered clearly I always please her do not tell some important things to my father, or he will punish me. But in the evening when the family gets sleep, I could her their conversation, the voice penetrate my door and into my ears, the content is just my secret. At that time, I think why she betray me? And doesn’t say yes when I request her? Gradually, I never trusted both of them anymore, not sharing my expreience in the school, not talking my mood, even with few word when we are sitting together. 

However, I’m positive and embrace the future actively. Love making friends in the university, planning all the way, these just he doen’t see. But the relationship between ours is hard to restore, this is a node, a dead node. All in all, I never complain about him, for I know he tries his best bringing us from that some village, that’s enough. Be a man, a real man, change the life.
fields.description: an answer to my father's question.

fields.title: recent_status
fields.content:
These two days, I really abandoned myself, I played computer games, downloaded games from GooglePlay, but little regret. This feeling is not the same as when I was in high school playing computer games hidden my parents, instead, maybe lack in stress, you have nothing to worry about. But I am really terribly upset, no clear reason, maybe stay at home too long, yes, university really changes me, it let me know I do not belong to anybody, I have my life, I could pursuit what I want. Drawing back when I was in high school, I was limited with my zone, even do not think higher of gaokao. It seems stupid at that time for someone else, but that was the real status at that time, even now I do not regret I got that grade and went to xjtlu. I think I was always confused when other students were striving for their university, but what I think was what I can do in the future. That was the first time I suspect my life, be a programmer? But in that way, why don’t I study these things, I also told this idea to my brothers, and he replied what else can you do if you do not take gaokao? Do not thinkg useless thing all day, go to study. Plus at that period, I finished some exercise books but get very low grades even retreating at the first times tesets. That was what I finished during the whole summer vacation, a real hit for me, and I did not have good learning strategies at that time also, nobody to complain, every time is so similar, eat the same food cooked by my mom, same vegetables, same meat, same ingredient, even same word which was about my grade after one test. To be truth, I even have a little tendency to suicide at that time, but being alive is always better to going die. Even if everything in your life is what you dislike, abandoning yourself, being indifferent to others, is always common. Everyday, the first thing I dis when I first went home was surfing the Internet, watching funny videos, because I think in this way I can ease myself, even if the evening before the real examination, I was watching Youtube from 5 to 8 o’clock, and I remember clearly just after the exam, my father drove home where we rented and moved original home inmediately, every action is so quickly, quickly to I can not wake. I had no feeling when I stayed at my room, watching everything would go away, not cherish the good time I spent here for three years, but something, but amazed at why he moved, he hates this community, this street, because he always quarreled with gate guard concerned with parking. 

Environment is pretty important, for one’s development. I was worried at that time, the whole year, because I just did not know how to realse my stress, like now, I can go fitness, programming, everything is so interesting for me. But at that time, once I got stressed, play games, play phone games, stop, do problem sets, getting stressed again, continuing playing games. This is a endless loop, and I could not jump it, because I never tried another way to get relaxed. I once told my father I wanted to lose weight just after the high school entrence exam, but he refused me, I did not know the reason, I was ashamed before my friend, and I locked the door, from 3pm to 8 pm at night, and got sleep at 10pm, 
I did not remember what happened exactly, but I knew I cried a lot, stop crying, think about these three years, cried again. And the second day, seemed nothing happened, but leaves a wide gap between I and my father. But actually, did I was a person with weak willpower? No, never, I could spend three months to keep running on the running machine for long time everyday during the vacation after gaokao, and also could study for 15,16 hours studying at the university. But why I abondoned myself at that time? Because I do not have such oppotunities, I was not allowed to do this to do that, just keep the rules, being a “quiet stutent”, listening the commonds from teachers and parents. What’s the meaning of the learning? Someone told me to get a good university. But what’s up if I am not graduated from a good university? You’re stupid, this society will not accept you, your could not enter the good company. And I asked again, but I don’t want to enter the good company, being a normal person is also decent, isn’t it? He replied me with repeating my words, and I knew nothing to talk with him. So I dis not figure out the relationship between career and diploma, the society, I lived in a different world, an artifical one, created by adults, and confused. Even now, I do not think getting a good university’s diploma is critical important, that’s not equal I do not want to go top university, the fame, the reputation, are always the non-significant factors, but the most important is you can find good people, good professors, good students who have the same dream as yours. I made some friends during these two semesters, and I though they are totally different from my friends who I ever made, they talked about their plans, their ideas, so gradually I learned from they, told what I though and my plans to them, and I felt that’s the different feeling from former. Because I used to make friends and did not talk what I real thought, and they also did. 

It’s a time to give an end. Sometimes my father gives me a hug, and in fact, I refused this hug either by refusing it with a relucant expression or receving it but refusing it in my heart. I know this hug has some addtional condition, becasuse this hug means owning, you are my kid, I would posses you as my wealth. And gradually, I learned I am becoming that person that people alway say” adopting the son in order to support yourself when you’re older”. Even if you will go abroad in the future, and even lead a good time, ten times good than what you will be in domestic when you’re trying your best. I disagree his point not because I do not want to take the responsibility to take care of him when he gets older, but I am aganish why he askes me fulfill my responsibility in this way which must ruin my dream ruining my efforts. If you say Chinese people are always treasuring native land and setting in stability, sorry, I am an American. I do not want to be the slave of parents, I do not want to be ont part of this restricted tradition. I think highly of my eudcation, my development, I will own my career in the future, nobody would stop me. Some emotional, but these might be the form of script from my inner world, continuing working on my TOF.
fields.description: These two days' feeling, a little worried😔😔😔

fields.title: better self
fields.content: At this moment, tired enough, but thinking about the plans, and current English ability which could not cope the test, suddenly do not know what to do next. Maybe I will achieve my goal according to my plan, maybe not, but try the best no matter the result. These days I might find the feeling in the high school, but all remember today, the future, too many things are waiting for me, the plans, the unknown places. Eyes are always located in front of the head, nothing to worry about. Time to say good night.

No big expectation in the next semester,  being more independent.

fields.title: this time last year
fields.content:
The afternoon before I will leave home for suzhou, is not reluctant  to leave, but this environment, which my parents do not want me to leave, impressed me. This day in the past year, I was already in the university, with companying with my parents. Little independent skill, is desired of the games , have no aim, no direction, everything is confused in the future. I even do not know why I choose this university when they ask me which university I want to go, I remembered I definitely choose xjtlu with hesitation, because I did not want to live with them any longer. Until this day, maybe exact the whole year, what do I learned from this year?
> Independent ability, the basic living skills, I could take care myself

> Independently learning skill, I could learn by myself without the help of the stupid teachers

> Finding my interests, reading books, programming, I found there are a wide range of things I could devote myself.

>Self-awareness, the plan for the future, I manage to arrange my future, aiming at the specific object

> Having consciousness of making friends, I know there are many things I could finish individually.

> Be dared to express myself, even if what I say is bullshit, but talk with others bravely and I always find some inspiration.

>Never leaving things tomorrow, if I have some thinkings, I will do them right now.

Maybe these are what I can think about immediately, in the new semester, I will be in grade2, I do not know what challenges I will meet, but my experience tells me if I face the problem with retreating, everything would be addressed finally. And these are what I want to improve in the new semester
> Speaking ability, learning how to express minds appropriately.

>Making more new friends, improve my making friends ability.

>Travel more frequently, studying all the way is not the whole thing, spending some time to relax mind would recharge me, improving learning efficiency

>Learn to accept the failure, everything could be failed even if I dedicate a lot, but anyway, failure is the part of the life, if I refuse to accept them, I am just a loser.

>Asking questions for people who know more than me, gaining more experience from the senior, being humble to people who can teach me a lot.

>Shouldering responsibility, dedicate to my job, no matter the result, just do what I should do.

>Insist on exercising, reducing the cream rate and thus having good body shape.

Even if the above, what I write is very vague, this is one point I always contradict, this is just guideline, improving me again, using these wonderful time to fill me with a variety of knowledge and abilities. Maybe this day in the next year, I would be different again. Waiting to be changed!
fields.description: some thinkings of this day in the past year, the day before leaving home to school.

fields.title: java_JIP_Exe
fields.description: Re-recognize java, small thinking of programming.

fields.description: The first class, you are free to ask any programming question on the Comment area. Don't afraid to ask Questions, your question is anonymous.

fields.title: first blog in the S2
fields.content:
破例写一篇中文博客...


最近这两天总感觉有一种莫名的焦虑感，我不知道是由于快要到来的TOF考试带给我的压力还是每天重复的活动已经让我对于生活有了一些厌倦感。现在才知道这是焦虑是孤独引起的，刚刚一个黑人小哥向我问路，起初我情绪很低落没有注意到周围有任何人，后来察觉到有人拍了我的肩膀，发现是一个外国人，有一些惊奇不知道他要做什么，后来给他指清楚了去翰林的路，当他太高手掌时我下意识理解了他要击掌以示感谢，我带着一种迷惑力不从心的向他击了个不太响的掌，后来他又问我是不是韩国人（可能穿着比较像棒子吧），我无奈的笑了笑解释了我是中国人。和他道别之后我一种豁然开朗的感觉，这是这两周回到苏州第一次有的一种满足，发自内心的开心，不是因为很外国人交流带来的新奇，而是一种温情，一种类似于亲情所带来的情感。当初刚来到学校的时候很傻，总觉得离开父母是一件很自由的事情，一种可以一个人无拘无束的生活，再也不用被他们说来说去，这可能可是十几年来一直很期待的事情吧。然而这种新奇感自由感仅仅持续了一个学期，到了大一的第二个学期当时一个人在备考托福，身边也没有人陪你，更别说鼓励了，复习了一段时间之后给我的感受是并不像别人所说的那么简单，轻松就可以上100，那段时间有一些焦虑，是由于理想和现实之间的差距带来的，我缺乏安全感，甚至有一段时间很想回家，只有家才能带给你这种独特的安全感。现在已经来学校两个星期了，想想自己的生活，每天6:40起床，12:00睡觉，早饭面包，上课，吃午饭，午睡，喝咖啡，上课，吃完饭，泡图书馆，睡觉。甚至每隔两天的健身已经很少能给我带来新鲜感。一天之内可交流对象只有舍友，Y朋友，没有人可以是知心朋友和他们谈谈心。现在仔细想想，那个黑人小哥明明自己有手机地图而且他已经导航到了目的地，或许他也是初到中国身边没有朋友亲人，只是想找一个native speaker来交流缓解心中的苦闷，遇见了情绪消沉的我也是倒霉，我表现的没有他预期那么热情，我的锅。现在距离托福考试只剩下两天了，我没有什么压力，这也好，托福分数够了能转学最好的，不够的话转不了也无所谓了，不过无论如何都是要去考的，这是生命中必须经历的坎，我只是不想看到自己准备了这么长时间的努力全都白费了。我不能说来到西浦我真正学到了什么让自己变得更牛逼的知识，但是我学会了勇敢，一种面对挑战第一反应不是退缩而是无论结果如何都要用尽全力，还有想到什么就去做什么，我知道了我应该去做什么而不是一味的顺从别人，一听到别人口中说大多数人怎么怎么样就会改变自己的注意。好不夸张地说，我的实力已经足够支撑起我的野心，托福已经不是能够击败我的敌人了，我有足够的把握考过这次转学所需要的分数。但是这几天一想到一个人在国外生活，没有朋友，尤其又是一个身份特殊的转学生，一切又要开始从0开始，不论是你的社交圈还是学业，又会变的很孤独，这次来到苏州之前一直在想要积极地和外国人交流，可是当你真正接触他们你会发现他们会有聚群现象，即使是单个的人在走，你想微笑以示友好，但他们面容冷漠，根本没有一点想和你交流的意愿。想到我在离家2000千米开外的地方上学，我不也是这座城市的陌生人吗？或许爸妈陪到苏州的火车其实不就是我们以后见更少面的标志吗？来到大学我为什么这么拼？不就是看到了真实的社会，未来的人生，不断探索世界，认知自我？从自我中心差距到了自己不过是人类社会中最普通的一个。我一直都在摆脱这种平庸，普通，因为一想到这样度过了18年，不免有些后悔，后悔的是错过了很多机会，表达自己想法的机会，这些在别人看来人正常，但是对于当时年幼的胆小懦弱的我来说表达自己会让自己发现一个新世界。


这学期多一些朋友，尝试对别人微笑，即使他们觉得我有病。托福加油！！！
fields.description: Stupid Chinese blog! Anyway, you could not view it🙃

fields.title: python_big_bug
fields.content:
```
a = []
b = {}
for i in range(5):
    b[i] = i
    a.append(b)
print(a)

>>>[{0: 0, 1: 1, 2: 2, 3: 3, 4: 4}, {0: 0, 1: 1, 2: 2, 3: 3, 4: 4}, {0: 0, 1: 1, 2: 2, 3: 3, 4: 4}, {0: 0, 1: 1, 2: 2, 3: 3, 4: 4}, {0: 0, 1: 1, 2: 2, 3: 3, 4: 4}]
```

```
a = []
for i in range(5):
    b = {}
    b[i] = i
    a.append(b)
print(a)
>>>[{0: 0}, {1: 1}, {2: 2}, {3: 3}, {4: 4}]
```

So, dict is updating, the added dict is also updating, if you write outside the `for`, this will create i dict which will be added into list, the second one will erease the old one!!

fields.title: Wiki crazy me
fields.content:
这几天翻墙看了wiki上的一些中共领导人的简介，还有一些百度上“根据相关法律法律不予以显示的内容”，深感到毛XX的黑暗与社会主义的谎言。

> 以前人们对于世界不了解，所以相信「风，火，水，木」这些超自然力量。随着全世界范围内的宗教运动的兴起，人们又把信仰转向了更加具体的实体上，比如各种各样的「神」。后来又随着民主思想的进步，人们戳破了有神论者的骗局，并且称这些为迷信，转而把目光投向了身边的人，把他们高高捧起，这就是「个人崇拜」。如今的社会没有人傻的将国家领导人看作是自己的亲人，我们关注生活，畅想明天，为生活而奔波，时刻想着怎样才能让世界更美好，人们相信「科学」。未来人又会信仰什么？

今天读了「文化大革命」深有感触，文革的毁灭性不在于10年的经济建设停滞，公民教育的丧失，珍贵文物的损失...毕竟楼房没了可以重新建，大学关闭了可以重新开，文物砸了重新攒，这些东西都是可以再来的，无非就是多花些人力物力罢了。但是文革最让我鄙夷的地方在于非物质 -- 大学生上山下乡，原本合理合法的考上大学可以真正地探索学术结果被分配在了某个小山沟里，梦想破碎了。开国元老被公开批斗，紧紧因为提出不和意见就被视为资本主义惨遭迫害，尊严被践踏了。最严重的在于人们的信任，这是人类生存最基本的保障，被邻居举报，被亲人举报，被朋友举报，最后举报你的人都是你想不到的。这些人有错吗？没有，为了生存，你不被批斗迫害，我就得遭殃，这时期的人都被贴上了「左右」的标签，现在人看起来实属好笑。文革结束了所有人都把责任推到了江青等的四人帮头上，却对于幕后黑手毛XX只字未提，我们的无产阶级民主呢？当我看到刘少奇平反词时，林彪，江青等反革命集团...，只字未提毛XX，虚假的报道，社会主义的媒体不可信，现在的也如此。还有已经远离政治中心十年之久的彭德怀被召北京，开始批斗，直至死亡，甚至死后被人说是潜藏在中共三四十年之久的叛徒，2333。

那我们的共产党呢，我们的社会主义呢？不过就是那时候（现在：——）)领导人统治人民的机器罢了。表面上对于人们团结一致，矛头朝外，内部却是争权夺势，毛泽东和林彪，周邓和高饶，邓小平和赵紫阳，四人帮...每个人都想着怎么才能把官做的更大，阿谀奉承，见风使舵不早已变成常态了吗，还表面说什么讲真话，做真事，bullhshit？我记不清了以前有位德国二战时期的首领说过这样一句话「人民总是愚蠢的，你告诉他们谁是我们的敌人，他们就会攻击」，是啊，那他们真的愚蠢吗？从信息传播的角度来讲，他们掌握的信息不对称，再加上个人崇拜，看上去却是很蠢。
fields.description: Some rebel mind...

fields.title: 博客改版
fields.content:
之前博客很乱，有自己的技术记录，生活分享，英语写作，甚至个人隐私，或许说之前也不明白应该把博客做成什么样子，毕竟也是第一次django框架搭建的，所以认为博客应该做的内容更广一些。所以呢，我的博客要改板了！遵循以下几个原则：

- 只使用中文，除非不得已的情况下写英语。

- 所有的文章公开，不回添加锁文章的功能。

- 所有的主题只与生活有关，不分享乱七八糟的内容。

- 重新设计UI，现在还是太丑了。

- 重新搭建之后不会再进行修改，除非bug修复。

- 经常写文章，不抛弃panblog博客。

-  一切从简，不追求炫酷特技。
fields.description: 简为原则。

fields.title: farewell，再见！
fields.content:
有很多人问我「你为什么转学？」。我回答了很多遍，但是每次都有些不一样， 从最开始客观条件上的授课内容、课程设置到后来自己的主观因素：对于环境的厌倦，求学的独立性。所以当拿到RU的offer时我也不再犹豫西浦，我从来没有热爱或者厌恶过这所学校，这两年是我人生中的求学经历，从学会独立打理生活到精致得规划人生，I learned。 这些并不是学校或者老师教给我的，而是我对于环境的适应性选择的结果。望着「be smart，be ture」的题顶大字踏着大理石阶梯提醒自己今日也要刻苦学习，十点铃息而归，记忆中也只有西交站的蓝色站牌灯光在这黑夜中格格不入，85c咖啡俨然打烊店内暖心黄色灯光沁人心脾。 这些也许是我认为的大学生生活 ，一人背包，来去匆匆。 这半个夏天给我的感觉就是再喝樱桃味的可乐。看上去微甜美好，尝到舌尖却是苦涩的中药味。 煎熬了半个多学期了，一直都幻想着UW的offer结果船到桥头自然沉；麻瓜编程投份简历也惨遭面壁；暑假毫无目标不知所措整日被接下来的生活、目标所困扰，生活大写的不顺。 离校前去Roger办公室找过他，我和他谈了许久，我觉得他观察得细致入微，说我经常满目愁容，我说了我在为未来的不确定而苦恼，他和我探讨了最近的作业成绩，人生规划。 现在倒是记不得多少了，只记得他一直都在劝我想开点、想开点。这世界上总有你努力了还是不能完成的事情或者说不公平对待，没必要整天为了考试、升学、工作、婚配、房子、车子这些东西所烦恼。 我时常在想自己努力到底是为了什么？18岁前我们总是继承别人的价值观活着，皓首穷经，鱼跃龙门，金榜提名便是大获全胜。上了大学后才发现世界并不是自己想象的那样的，还有很多东西等着自己去学习，有种失望甚至被欺骗的感觉。之后呢？无人引导，接下来的都要靠自己去探索，发现自己真正的兴趣而不是随波逐流；融入整个世界而不是躲藏在自己思想意识的象牙塔里；用尽全力去追逐自己想要的东西而不是行尸走肉般苟活每一天。做更好的自己。

![This is my life]( http://otr4re8c8.bkt.clouddn.com/2018-5-21/11422405.jpg) 再也不会青葱绿叶的早晨，和一行年龄相似风华正茂的陌生人一同路过上学之路。 ![description]( http://otr4re8c8.bkt.clouddn.com/2018-5-21/70706337.jpg "A blue day") 再见了，陪我度过无数时光的自习教室，在也找不到一个像样的阴天可以痛痛快快地享受学习带来的乐趣了。再见了，还没来得及说再见就下市的海盐小莓好。 再见了，那个不成熟的自己。

fields.title: 南京行
fields.content:
期末考试刚一收尾，便匆匆收拾自己的行李，当一脚迈进预约好的滴滴时一个人的旅程已经开始了，去过无数次苏州北站了所以也见过良莠不齐的出租车司机，有的能给你介绍怎么能在苏州晚上玩的开心，有的倒是老苏州推荐各种值得去值得吃的经典美食，这次是个闷葫芦从上车到下车什么没说，“一路顺风”也不是每个司机的口头禅。 进站，坐车，出站，这便是南京了。按图索骥，直往酒店，看到酒店里的双人大床幸福感不免油然而生，宿舍那翻身都困难的小板床就相形见绌了。简单的安置好东西后已经是8点，外出品尝了当地特色鸭血粉丝汤，没有什么惊喜，也就是味蕾上各种食材的记忆组合的味道。之后便睡.... 起床了，第一天去了总统府，两江总督署，江宁织署，太平天国天王府，民国总统府。存留了太多近代历史遗风。 现代建筑的室内装饰偏现代风，深褐色木门，高光质感地板，委员长的半生军服照。室外倒是园林风光，假山方亭，月门劲竹，绿波石舫，碧瓦朱檐,极尽江南特色。总统府的美，倒不是政治权利的严肃美，更像是一种中西文化交织的融合美，民国遗风，枪炮变革中的沧海遗珠。
day2， 夫子庙也是南京行的重要景点之一,没来过之前一直都在右疑惑为什么南京会有孔庙？夫子明明是山东曲阜人啊，这都要蹭热度？来到之后恰逢听到了隔壁导游的讲解，父子庙始建于北宋时期，选拔人才都是通过科举制，科举制后的莘莘学子不祈福老师校长，靠这位千年前的先贤圣哲，中国人的信仰啊可不是那么容易改变的，我们和古人之间的联系大抵靠的就是这文化的认同感了吧。南宋时期这里改为江南贡院，更是人才辈出，全国范围内有一半的佼佼者都是出自于此。
瞻园是江南四大园林之一，去过苏州的两个园林,确实园林很具有美感，但是对于我这种不懂得欣赏园林设计的人来说，只觉得精致，却说不出怎么个精致法。其次是大多数的园林在过去都是私有的，不论是太平天国哪个乱臣贼子的贝阙珠宫抑或是王公大臣的名人雅居，即使交过门票费，也总有种闯入非非的惴惴不安的感觉。这大都是穷人无法想象的富态美了吧。
fields.description: 6月中旬，孤身南京行记

fields.title: 夏夜之梦
fields.content:
窗外货车轰鸣而过，留下蝉鸣两三，这个暑假子时大都是如此吧。26号的飞机，转眼就要离开了，飞往远方，那个魂牵梦萦又忧心忡忡的大洋彼岸。「家」这个熟悉的字眼让我渐行渐远；“回家了”，站在家门前我在心中默念道，朱红退尽的春联，枯槁如灰的茱萸，出门太久了吧，外面的世界早已把「家」这一方天地驱赶到内心一隅，一种想法忽然萌生「这是父母的家，不是我的家」，这种意识愈发强烈直到现在也无法排散，我记得以前写作文总是把家比做避风港，现在看来是补给站更加贴切，早晚要从这里出走，开始经营自己的「家」。 

出门在外我总是很担心家里人的情况，我被这个世界的发展速度感到焦虑， 回到家之后发现每个人都自得其所，为自己的目标而奋斗。NIL如愿考上了北大的研究生，9月份前往深圳开始新的学业修行；妈妈在她45岁之际迎来了事业的新征程；老爸要开始拓展新的项目工程，豪言壮志未老。反倒是我不知所措，没有任何目标。之前在知乎上看到过问题「20岁的你是什么样的状态？」，距离20岁不剩几个月了，现在的我处于休学过渡状态，从一所大学退学，即将前往另一所大学继续学习，20岁的我发现了除了学习之外还有更多的问题等着我；20岁的我感到了人生的痛苦，能感同身受他人的经历；20岁的我迷茫无助，不知自己的归所何处。

前段时间NIL向我感慨到「pan我再也找不到小时候的那种快乐了」，是呀再也找不到了。 我怀念和他小时候暑假的游戏时光，在热血江湖里问鼎称霸；我怀念初中周六下午的一人时光，躺在弹簧床上舒筋解乏；我怀念阳台上阳光透过毛玻璃间隔的光束，老妈在一旁刺绣，我则看两页教材书。 这个暑假可能也是这辈子最后一个同家人相处如此之久的假期了。

曾和朋友离别过，这次轮到和家人离别了。今晚奶奶还给我打电话了，电话那头哽咽难语，我只好简单安慰不断地重述「我很好，毋庸担心」。「好」这个字很神奇，拆开就是「子女」，向长辈解释自己的状况多说无益，好字即可。我还记得小学暑假从老家返城，当天早奶奶准备了一大壶牛奶，我以为是当天为了践行故意扩大了容量，为了不辜负奶奶的好心就牛饮而尽，回城之后才得知那是奶奶多取了牛奶竟是三日的量，弄得家人啼笑皆非。小时的离别情融在奶中，今日的离别情含在泪里。
fields.description: 夏夜的屋外为什么总有蝉鸣？

fields.title: A week in America
fields.content:
Taking off, jolted, landing, 14 hours' flight, my brain can't revive from this hellish trip, crowded cabin, frozen ac, same faces but different people. Here I am, America! No cheer, remain excitement, but more of fear. Fear the people of indifference, fear the places of unfamiliarity, fear the custom I can't get rid of. The first day I greeted everyone I met, I saw the squirrel jumping around the grass, I was impressed by the drivers giving the path to me. This land is amazing, I love here! Following, surviving, the food I can't get used to, everything tasted with the herb. The time difference makes me tired off, wanting to vomit anything driven by my unrecovered never system. The people here, you can't talk freely because of your broken English. Gradually, the mind "why I leave Chian confused me" abrupted up, but I never want to back again. Here is my future, of fortune and opportunity, I know this. There's no absolute way, just flowering in another branch you choose.
I am better! I mean the independence, the American students are not independent as imagined before, most of them still need preparing by their parents, families accompanying them around, trunk packed with love, inescapable love from parents, they are surrounded with love, the comfortable love, they never think to leave away. You can see everyone, enthusiastic, but u never know how they think in which way, that is horrible. A week in America, a meaningful day, I can't cherish this day with my friends enjoying at a fancy eatery but celebrating myself with hilarity. Loneliness is my only friend, which keeps me calm, reminds me what am I eager to tightly, distinguishes me in this unknown country. Sharping your intelligence, embracing the challenges you'll meet, greet everyone with your unique warmness. The day, every day, love it in this way you think now.

fields.title: 雪团
fields.content:
前天还在和地理课的女生调侃我很久没见到雪了，她说“you will see the storm in NJ”。果不其然昨天就下了第一场雪，下午因为错过了车站顶着暴雪去了一个教授的办公室交流了下学习体会。办公室门口已经有3个学生在等待了，有问教授要推荐信的，有cs课问题的，还有一门其他数学课的同学，我们4个人，目的各不相同。终于等到我了，第一句就是问我名字然后他直接查找了具体的排名，还好数学是门付出与收获成正比的科目，他评价我“you are the top student"，喜出望外之余有些意外，我本以为美国这边更加注重学生的感受所以教授会有所保留，其实是一样的，之后交流了一些选课的事情还有minor statistic。然后就回宿舍了，站在窗口望着外边的雪，路灯也亮得很早，白色和橘黄色，夹杂着屋内的暖气，这是温馨的感觉，还有睡意，然后就小憩了一会儿。 晚上结束最后一门cs课和floormate tom一起走回宿舍，之前和他交流给我留下印象：喜欢日本漫画，游戏，日式电影。我问他为什么喜欢日本文化（美式文化的奇葩），他说super hero都太假了，什么人会喷火，飞天呀，that's fake。

：）多才多艺的死宅最可怕 很久都没有这么安定了，总是被“自己是谁，要去何处”这个问题困扰。在这里每天都得用功学习，自己安排的计划充实到没时间去思考这个问题，其实也挺好的。我觉得长大不只是一个人的感受，今天上课隔壁桌的土耳其女生说她感到不快乐，她也不知道什么原因，她说:"I don't want to study, I don't want to do anything. I think my grandparetns ... [maybe die someday (I cannot describe literally)]"这和我平常所担心的事情不是一样的嘛？“父母在，不远行”并不是中国人独有的，因为出生死亡就是自然定理，更何况老人上了年龄让年轻人担心是在所难免的，这就好像是你的计划表上被添加的一项不定期的计划，我们肯定要为他们的去世而伤心。但有时候思考过多会带来负担，没完没了得思考这些注定的问题会让生活变得沮丧，失去活下去的动力。“不以物喜，不以己悲”。不因为考试得高分，拿丰厚的工资而感到高兴；也不因为家人离别，遭遇不幸而感到过度悲伤。因为这就是生活啊，有些事情不能由自己决定，那就let it go。 我曾不止一次幻想坐在Wall Street百层大厦之中，侧身靠着百叶窗，将百元美钞叠成小飞机，从这高空之中扔下去，轻轻地，缓缓地，让它随着欲望之风飘荡... 什么功成名就， 光彩耀人，什么行业精英，济世之才，都是假的，我只想做一个有趣的普通人，和我喜欢的女孩过一辈子。有时候人生就是这样矛盾的，想做一个普通人，又想做一个成功的人；想做一个好人，又不想做一个循规蹈矩的人。有时候太痛苦了，多希望我们的人生是git的master，这样就可以在不同的branch尝试新鲜的东西，然后把最好的结果同步到master上去。 窗外在下着雪，我在小隔间写作。have a good day, man.
fields.description: 在异乡第一次经历的snow day
